All functions

auto_import_utf8()
Automatically import CSV or Excel files and convert character columns to UTF-8
bbox_danube_basin
Polygon that includes the Danube River Basin

Check Data Frame Column Names Against Darwin Core Standard Terms
check_coordinates()
Check Coordinates for WGS84 and Decimal Degrees and Convert to Numeric
check_duplicates()
Check for Duplicate Records in a Data Frame
check_species_name()
Check Species Names with Variable Accuracy and Manual Editing Option
check_year_column()
Check Missing Values and Validity of Year Column
clean_gbif()
Clean GBIF Occurrence Records

Create Metadata File
danube_basin
Danube River Basin
dms_to_decimal()
Convert Degrees, Minutes, Seconds (DMS) to Decimal Degrees (DD)
download_gbif_records()
Download GBIF Records for Specified Species within a Polygon
dwc_names
Darwin Core Terms for Occurrence Datasets
extract_date()
Extract Day, Month, and Year from Date Column
extract_location_info()
Extract Municipality, Province, and Country using Latitude and Longitude (OSM)
fish_data
Fish species occurrence records from GBIF
gbif_data
Fish species occurrence records from GBIF
generate_global_identifier()
Generate Persistent Global Identifiers (UUID)
get_spatial_subset()
Get Spatial Subset of Data
get_taxonomy_info()
Get Taxonomy Information Including Genus, Family and Order

Get WKT Representation of Polygon from sf Object in Counterclockwise Order

Interactive Point Snapping on Map

Perform a Spatial Join of Points with GADM Administrative Boundaries
species_checklist
Species list based on a preliminary fish species check list of the Danube River Basin produced by the Join Danube Survey 5 (JDS5)
split_and_save_csv()
Split a data frame based on the values of a column and save each subset as a CSV file
